H0.text: Ornette Coleman, Louis Armstrong and Charles Mingus are associated with what style of music. Blues

H1.text: Ornette Coleman, Louis Armstrong and Charles Mingus are associated with what style of music. Improvisational

H2.text: Ornette Coleman, Louis Armstrong and Charles Mingus are associated with what style of music. Avant-Garde

H3.text: Ornette Coleman, Louis Armstrong and Charles Mingus are associated with what style of music. Jazz

A4.text: The bassist Charles Mingus is also frequently associated with the avant-garde in jazz

A5.text: The first major stirrings came in the 1950s with the early work of Ornette Coleman

A8.text: Charles Mingus was an American jazz upright bassist, composer, bandleader, pianist, and author.

A9.text: Mingus was a pioneer in double bass technique and a major proponent of collective improvisation, similar to the old New Orleans jazz parades.
